person.note: Nepalese king, reigned ca 1560–1574.
Buddhist monk, commissioned Bodleian MS. Sansk. d. 346(R).
Vajrācārya, scribe of Bodleian MS. Sansk. d. 346(R).

person.persName: Mahārāja Chandra Shamsher Jang Bahadur Rana
person.note: Mahārāja of Nepāl (1863-1929).
Author of the Bhairavapadmāvatīkalpa
Author of theBhairavapadmāvatīkalpaṭīkā.
Author of the Bhagavatīsūtra according to the Jaina tradition.
Author of the Mugdhabodha.
Author of the Sāṅkhyacandrikā.
Maharaja Chandra Shamsher Jang Bahadur Rana (1863-1929).
Author of the Sāṅkhyatattvakaumudī.
Author of a vyākhyā on Vācaspati Miśra's Sāṅkhyatattvakaumudī.
Scribe of MS Chandra Shum Shere d.459(4), active in the first half of the 19th century.
Rājaśekhara, Vi.Saṃ. 1399-1405, Harṣapurīyagaccha (Maladhārigaccha), disciple of Śrītilaka, preceptor of Sudhākalaśa, composed Antarakathāsaṃgraha.
Ratnaśekhara, sūri, about Vi.Saṃ. 1390-1430, Nāgapurīyatapāgaccha.
Bhāvacandra, paṭṭadhara Vi.Saṃ. 1095-1115, Digambara, author of Śāntināthacaritra [Śāntipurāṇa].
Scribe of MS. Ind. Inst. Sansk. 45. Is this Muni Premacandra the same as Premacandra, about Vi.Saṃ. 1675, Nāgapurīyatapāgaccha, pupil of Hīrānandacandra (about Vi.Saṃ. 1650, Nāgapurīyatapāgaccha)?
Author of the Sāṅkhyasūtra.
Author of the Sāṅkhyasūtravṛttisāra.
